setgreet.Description: Toggle announcements on the current channel when someone joins the server.

greetmessage.Description:
Set the announcement message when someone joins the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user who joined the server
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form.

setbye.Description: Toggle announcements on the current channel when someone leaves the server.

byemessage.Description:
Set the announcement message when someone leaves the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user who joins
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form.

setmodlog.Description: Set the current channel as "mod-log" channel where I will post notifications about warn, mute, unmute, kick, ban, softban, pruneban. Provide no arguments to disable it from the current channel.

renamecategory.Description: Rename a category. Separate the old name from the new name with '->'.

addtextchanneltocategory.Description: Add a text channel to a category. Separate the channel name from the category name with '->'

addvoicechanneltocategory.Description: Add a voice channel to a category. Separate the channel name from the category name with '->'

addemote.Description: Add an emote on this server. PNG, JPG or GIF supported. The image must be under 256 KB.

deleteemote.Description: Delete an emote from this server.

renameemote.Description: Rename an emote from this server. You need to separate the old name by the new name with '->'

kick.Description: Kick an user. If you provide a reason message I will DM the user with the reason.

ban.Description: Ban an user. If you provide a reason message I will DM the user with the reason.

softban.Description: Ban an user, remove his messages from last 7 days, and then unban it. The result is a kick.

pruneban.Description: Ban an user and remove his messages from last 7 days. Different from "softban" where the user is unbanned.

prune.Description:
`[prefix]prune x` removes last x number of messages from the channel (up to 100).
`[prefix]prune @User` removes all User's messages in the last 100 messages.

mute.Description: Mute an user from text and voice channels. You can mute temporally: months(mo), weeks(w), days(d), hours(h), minutes(m).

unmute.Description: Unmute an user from text and voice channels.

setmute.Description: Set the mute role. If the role doesn't exists it will be created.

roles.Description: Show the roles on this server.

rolecolor.Description: Set a color for a role.

renamerole.Description: Rename a Role. You need to separate the old name by the new name with '->'

setrole.Description: Set a role for an user.

removerole.Description: Remove a role from an user.

autoassignablerole.Description: Set a role to be auto-assigned for every user who joins the server. Provide no role to deactivate it.

hoistrole.Description: Set whether or not a role should be displayed independently in the userlist.

mentionrole.Description: Set whether or not a role should be mentioned.

iam.Description: Assign to yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.

iamnot.Description: Remove from yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.

addselfassignablerole.Description: Add a role in the server's self assignable roles list.

removeselfassignablerole.Description: Remove a role from the server's self assignable roles list.

listselfassignableroles.Description: Show a list with the server's self assignable roles list.

updateselfassignableroles.Description: Update the roles and their names from the server's self assignable roles list.

setnickname.Description: Set an user's nickname in this server. Provide no arguments to remove the nickname.

renametextchannel.Description: Rename a text channel. Separate the old name from the new one with '->'.

setnsfwchannel.Description: Toggle this channel or another channel as NSFW.

renamevoicechannel.Description: Rename a voice channel. Separate the old name from the new one with '->'.

warning.Description: Warn an user. Also, you can specify a reason.

warninglist.Description: Show a list with all warned users.

warninglog.Description: Show all warnings for an user.

warningclear.Description: Clear an warning from an user. Type `all` to clear all warnings.

warningpunishment.Description: Set the number of warnings (maximum 10) for an user to be punished and the punishment method (mute, kick, ban), or 0 to disable the punishment. Provide no arguments to show the current punishment method.

leaveguild.Description: Mek me to leave a guild/server.

update.Description: Shut down the application. If the option to update the project is set on linux it will update and start the application.

send.Description: Send a message to an user <u:user-id> or to a channel from a server <c:channel-id>. Embed is supported.

edit.Description: Edit a message of mine in a server <channel-id|message-id>. Embed is supported.

votes.Description: Show a list with voters within the last 12 hours from Discord Bots List.

finduser.Description: Search an user from Discord and show its info.

Remarks: [prefix]execsql UPDATE table SET column WHERE condition...

downloadusers.Description: Download all users from a guild

activity.Description: Sets my activity to `Playing`, `Listening to`, `Watching` or `Streaming`

Remarks:
[prefix]activityrotate 30 playing r!h for help
watching anime

status.Description: Sets my status to Online, Idle/AFK, DnD or Invisible`

setusername.Description: Set my username. Be careful, it can be changed twice per hour.

setavatar.Description: Set my profile picture/avatar. Be careful, it can be changed twice per hour.

delete.Description: Delete an user from the database. The currency, global xp, waifus and profile settings will be erased.

db.Description: Show details about an user from the database.

blacklist.Description: Add an user to the blacklist. It will cannot generate global xp and will cannot receive [currency].

removeblacklist.Description: Remove an user from the blacklist. It will can generate global xp and will can receive [currency].

botban.Description: Ban an user from using me. It will also be added to the blacklist.

removebotban.Description: Unban an user, allow it to use me. It will not be removed from the blacklist (if it is).

event.Description:
Start the heart event to win [currency].
Parameters: timeout (seconds), reward, message.

stopevent.Description: Stop any event that is running.

deletecommandmessage.Description: Toggle deletion of the user's message that triggered the command.

wheel.Description: Bet on wheel. You can win up to 2x of the bet.

reward.Description: Reward an user with some amount of [currency].

take.Description: Take some amount of [currency] from an user.

cash.Description: Check the currency you have or for an user.

leaderboard.Description: Show a list with [currency] of users.

blackjack.Description:
Play a game of blackjack. Minimum bet 5[currency], maximum bet 5000[currency].

Options:
- hit(🎴) - draw a card from the deck
- stand(🤚) - stand pat with your cards
- split(↔) - split your hand in two if you have a pair

The game is played with 4 decks.
Remarks: [prefix]bj resume (resume the blackjack session in the current channel)
[prefix]bj stop (surrender, you will lose the bet)

help.Description: Show a help info for a single command, or DMs you if no parameters are specified.

modules.Description: Show a list with all modules.

commands.Description: Show a list with all commands of a module.

allcommands.Description: Show a list with all commands.

hentai.Description: Shows a hentai image. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

danbooru.Description: Shows a hentai image from Danbooru. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

konachan.Description: Shows a hentai image from Konachan. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

yandere.Description: Shows a hentai image from Yande.re. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

gelbooru.Description: Shows a hentai image from Gelbooru. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

hentaiplus.Description: Show multiple hentai images from Danbooru, Konachan, Yandere and Gelbooru. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

profile.Description: Show your profile or for an user.

backgroundimage.Description: Set the profile's background image. Only https. Direct image links, png, jpg or jpeg allowed. Price: 1000 [currency]. For better results, resize the image to 500x300. NSFW images are not allowed, if someone uses, report them to the support server and they will be banned.

backgrounddim.Description: Set the profile's background dim. Default is 50%.

anime.Description: Shows info for an anime from AniList.

manga.Description: Shows info for a manga from AniList.

character.Description: Shows info for a character from AniList.

animelist.Description: Shows a list with anime from AniList.

mangalist.Description: Shows a list with manga from AniList.

characters.Description: Shows a list with characters and their IDs from AniList.

osu.Description: Shows osu!standard stats for an osu player.

taiko.Description: Shows osu!taiko stats for an osu player.

ctb.Description: Shows osu!ctb stats for an osu player.

mania.Description: Shows osu!mania stats for an osu player.

urbandictionary.Description: Search on urban dictionary. You can provide a page also.

prefix.Description: Set the prefix on this server (Requires **Administrator**). Provide no arguments to show the current server's prefix.

calcops.Description: Shows all expression options for `calc` command.

userinfo.Description: Shows the info for an user. Provide no arguments to show your info.

serverinfo.Description: Shows the info for this server.

shardsinfo.Description: Shows the connection state of all shards.

useravatar.Description: Shows the avatar for an user. Provide no arguments to show your avatar.

servericon.Description: Shows the icon of this server.

whoisplaying.Description: Shows a list with all users from the server that play a game.

choose.Description: I will choose an item from a list. Separators allowed: `,`, `|`, `;`

color.Description: Generates a preview image of a hex color.

claimwaifu.Description: Claim your waifu from anime. The price for every waifu starts from 1000 [currency] and it's rising with each claim with 10 [currency], also it will decrease for each divorce. The character must be on AniList's database.

belovedwaifu.Description: Make a waifu beloved. You can set only one waifu. The price is 5000 [currency]. This action is not reversible. Use the name or id.

divorce.Description: Divorce from a waifu. Use the name or id.

waifus.Description: Shows all your waifus or for an user.

belovedwaifuavatar.Description: Set to your beloved waifu a new avatar. Only https. Direct image links, png, jpg or jpeg allowed. For better results, resize the image to 100x155.

createwaifu.Description: Create your own waifu. Put a direct link link and a name. The price is 10000 [currency]. She will have the beloved status automatically.

xp.Description: Shows your guild level and xp, global level and xp, or for an user.

xpnotify.Description: Enable or disable the server xp notification.

leveluprolereward.Description: Add a role in the level up role reward list. When an user reaches the level it will be rewarded with the role. To remove a role from the list provide no role for the respective level.

leveluprolerewards.Description: Shows all level up role rewards for this server.

resetguildexperience.Description: Resets the xp leaderboard for this server.

removeglobalexperience.Description: Remove global xp from an user.

setgloballevel.Description: Set the global level for an user.

play.Description:
1. Play a track. Automatically search from YouTube using keywords or provide a link.
2. Provide a youtube playlist link to create a playlist.
I will auto-join to the voice channel.

leave.Description: Stops the music playback and I leave the voice channel.

skipto.Description: Skips to a track in the queue by an index or words contained in the track's title.

seek.Description: Seeks to a specific time in the current track. The format is hms

volume.Description: Sets the volume of music player or shows the current volume.

remove.Description: Removes a song by name or id. The name doesn't need to be complete.

repeat.Description: Toggles repeating of the current song.
